item.title: Lightning Network BOLT by BOLT
item.description: Topic: Lightning Network BOLT by BOLT Location: LA Blockchain Meetup Transcript by: glozow Introduction I’m Jim from the protocol team at Coinbase. We work on open source stuff in the crypto space. We just contribute to projects like Bitcoin core. The reason I’m talking about this is I’ve been contributing on and off to one of the major lightning implementations lnd for the past eight months or so. This is gonna be a fairly technical talk.
